channel.title: Cyberpickpocket on Malicious Link
channel.description: Recent content in Cyberpickpocket on Malicious Link

item.title: Cyber Pickpocketing
item.description: Drink!! So I’ve been working on a training package that takes a bit of a different approach than what I’ve normally done. The training breaks down like this: Day 1: Local LAN based exploit (Windows) Day 2: Remote Web based exploit (Linux) Day 3: Client side exploit (Windows) Day 4: Local exploit (FreeBSD) Day 5: Network of the Seven Bells Test Each day (save for the 5th) will focus on a single exploit, explaining it, running it on virtual machines, and spending 8 hours diving into as many detectable changes that exploit makes on a system.
